data.text: Ila gweye, Tito, kolondigwa ufundize gaja gali mmafundizo gali na mhiko.
Wafundize wavyele wa kimbigalo waizuile, walumbe kuhishimilwa, na wawe na ng'hungwe. Wagangamale mnhamanila, mdinoge, na mkwazaganya.
Vivija wafundize wavyele wa kitwanzi wakale mnzila imnogele Mulungu, sambiwawalonge wanhu vihile ama kuwa nyakadala wa ugimbi. Ila wawafundize wandele zao gaja ganogile.
Wavyele wa kitwanzi wolondigwa wawafundize wandele zao wawanogele wambigalo zao na wana zao,
waizuile, wang'ale, wasang'hanike mkae zao, wawe na moyo unogile, na wawe wende ha wambigalo zao, giladi Usenga wa Mulungu sambiulongigwe vihile.
Vivija walongeleni mkuwayalalila wamhale giladi waizuile.
Gweye uwe ningo mkutenda vinhu vose vinogile. Mmafundizo gako, sambiuwe na uzenzeleganye, na usegeze kinyala.
Fundiza ikweli giladi mafundo gako sambigawe na ving'hwaso, abaho munhu yoyose yondayakubeze yone kinyala, yawe bule kinhu chochose kihile cha kutulonga tweye.
Wafundize nyakadala wawe wende ha wandewa zao na kuwanogeza mkila kinhu, sambiwaibamilile nao
ama kuwebila, ila walaguse kamba mazua gose hewo wanoga na wabule uzenzeleganye, giladi mnzila zose wagatende mafundo ga Mulungu Mkombola wetu goneke ganoga.
Kwavija ngekewa ya Mulungu igala ukombola igubuligwa ha wanhu wose.
Ngekewa hiyo yotufundiza kuleka kukala ukazi wa kumgevuza Mulungu, kuleka sulukila za muulumwengu, na kukala ukazi wa kuizuila, kuwa bule uzenzeleganye, na kumnogeza Mulungu muulumwengu uno.
Kuno tobeta zua dimotezwe ditutamanila, kipigiti Mulungu wetu Mkulu na Mkombola wetu Yesu Kilisto vondayoneke na yenzi yake.
Kailava mwenyego sama yetu tweye giladi yatukombole kulawa mmbuli zose zihile na kuwang'aliza wanhu zake sama yake mwenyego wawe na sulukila ya kutenda ganogile.
Avo mbuli zino zizo zondaufundize. Uwagangamize wanhu na uwakomhokele na udaho wako wose. Sambiumuleke munhu yoyose yakuzabuze.
